channel.title: Homes on Jose Ricardo Zapata
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Jose Ricardo Zapata

item.description: Biography I’m a Professor at the Faculty of Information and Communication Technologies (TIC), Universidad Pontificia Bolivariana (UPB) and researcher at GIDATI My research interests are based around sound and music information technologies, which includes information retrieval, data mining and digital signal processing, with applications to music information retrieval, audio analysis and data science.

item.title: Teaching
item.description: Current and past, postgraduate and undergraduate courses at the Universidad Pontificia Bolivariana (UPB) Postgraduate Courses Level | UnderGraduate Courses Level Audio Processing Ph.D | Signal Processing B.Sc Principles of Image Processing Ph.D | Principles of Audio B.Sc Audio and Image Data Mining M.Sc | Data Mining B.Sc Signal Processing M.Sc | Audio Applications B.Sc Telecommunications Principles M.

item.title: Phd Thesis
item.description: Comparative evaluation and combination of automatic rhythm description systems Zapata, Jose R. (2013). Comparative evaluation and combination of automatic rhythm description systems. Ph.D. thesis (Information and Communication Technologies), Universitat Pompeu Fabra, Barcelona, Spain, 2013.
